Effect: According to My Calculations.name: Effect: According to My Calculations
Effect: According to My Calculations.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.IJvX7FJ40i84XPuR]{According to My Calculations}

You gain a circumstance bonus or penalty to your next skill check or attack roll depending on the result.

Effect: Adaptive Locomotion.name: Effect: Adaptive Locomotion
Effect: Adaptive Locomotion.description: If you select flippers, you gain a swim Speed of 20 feet. If you select hooked pseudopods, you gain a climb Speed of 20 feet.

Effect: Aim.name: Effect: Aim
Effect: Aim.description:
You deal an additional 1d4 precision damage, and reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your mark gets from cover by 1. These benefits only apply if your mark is within your weapon's first range increment. You can only have one mark at a time.

As your operative level increases, so does your ability to Aim. Increase the number of dice for the precision damage by one at 5th, 11th, and 17th levels. At 11th level, you reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your mark gains from cover by 2 rather than 1. At 17th level, you reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your mark gains from cover by 4 rather than 2.

Effect: Apocalypse Smite.name: Effect: Apocalypse Smite
Effect: Apocalypse Smite.description: The Fang deals an additional 2d8 void damage to the marked target.

Effect: Arcane Intuition.name: Effect: Arcane Intuition
Effect: Arcane Intuition.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to counteract checks against spells and ongoing magic effects. If you are legendary in Arcana, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus instead.

Effect: Atmospheric Flight.name: Effect: Atmospheric Flight
Effect: Atmospheric Flight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.wZyBTTRM2BjC93gg]{Atmospheric Flight}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed plus 10 feet.

Effect: Bolstered by Battle.name: Effect: Bolstered by Battle
Effect: Bolstered by Battle.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Brace For Impact.name: Effect: Brace For Impact
Effect: Brace For Impact.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.hXcgSVdVJcA5cqnh]{Steel Yourselves!}

You gain Temporary Hit Points equal to the origin's Charisma modifier + half their level

Lead by Example If you spend an action to Brace For Impact before the end of your turn, you and any ally who Braces for Impact before the start of your next turn also gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against effects that deal damage.

Effect: Bring It On!.name: Effect: Bring It On!
Effect: Bring It On!.description: You take a –2 circumstance penalty to AC and gain resistance to all damage equal to half your level. If you have the armor storm fighting style, you gain resistance equal to your level against attacks made by Suppressed enemies.

Effect: Broken Cycle.name: Effect: Broken Cycle
Effect: Broken Cycle.description: You gain resistance 5 to cold or fire.

Effect: Bullet Fever.name: Effect: Bullet Fever
Effect: Bullet Fever.description:
• You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your key attribute modifier.
  • You automatically apply precision damage to all targets as though you were Aiming.
  • You take a –2 circumstance penalty to AC.
  • You take a –2 circumstance penalty to Will saves.

Effect: Celebrity Serum.name: Effect: Celebrity Serum
Effect: Celebrity Serum.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.equipment.Item.YEuvWZhtsvTqJJo1]{Celebrity Serum}

You gain a +1 item bonus to Performance checks.

Effect: Cellular Regeneration.name: Effect: Cellular Regeneration
Effect: Cellular Regeneration.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.SiVWK0ksapz0Y8UU]{Cellular Regeneration}

You gain regeneration equal to half your level.

Effect: Confounding Disquisition.name: Effect: Confounding Disquisition
Effect: Confounding Disquisition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.CCe7Y7aiUgixFyiV]{Confounding Disquisition}

You take a –1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Effect: Cooperative.name: Effect: Cooperative
Effect: Cooperative.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.LHtaCR4gS4kozJyP]{Cooperative}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to Aid.

Effect: Deadlift.name: Effect: Deadlift
Effect: Deadlift.description: You can carry 4 more Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered. The amount you can carry increases to 6 at expert, 8 at master, and 10 at legendary.

Effect: Defensive Formation.name: Effect: Defensive Formation
Effect: Defensive Formation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.xF4Vse5IwmWveqxI]{Defensive Formation}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and Reflex saving throws.

Effect: Effortless Influencer.name: Effect: Effortless Influencer
Effect: Effortless Influencer.description: Your gain a +1 status bonus to the next check you attempt with the chosen skill (or a +2 bonus if your check was a critical success).

Effect: Electric Kalo.name: Effect: Electric Kalo
Effect: Electric Kalo.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.heritages.Item.ZAOKze0PTYPPbUua]{Electric Kalo}

You gain electricity resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1).

Effect: Elemental Perfect Harmony.name: Effect: Elemental Perfect Harmony
Effect: Elemental Perfect Harmony.description: You gain resistance to two elements chosen during the mystic's daily preparations.

Effect: Energy Consumption.name: Effect: Energy Consumption
Effect: Energy Consumption.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.3RqBU4dfoegOPzqw]{Energy Consumption}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level and the Energy Shielding feat.

Effect: Enraging Presence.name: Effect: Enraging Presence
Effect: Enraging Presence.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Force Field.name: Effect: Force Field
Effect: Force Field.description: Tracking effect for your force field's HP.

Effect: Get 'Em!.name: Effect: Get 'Em!
Effect: Get 'Em!.description:
That creature takes a –1 circumstance penalty to AC and Reflex saves.

Lead by Example If you attack the target you select before the end of your turn, you reveal a weak point in your foe's defenses. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to 1 + half your Charisma modifier, and your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against the target. As your envoy level increases, so does this damage. Increase the damage by 1 at 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th levels.

Effect: Get 'Em! (Lead by Example).name: Effect: Get 'Em! (Lead by Example)
Effect: Get 'Em! (Lead by Example).description:
Ephermeral effect.

If you attack the target you select before the end of your turn, you reveal a weak point in your foe's defenses. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to 1 + half your Charisma modifier, and your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against the target. As your envoy level increases, so does this damage. Increase the damage by 1 at 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th levels.

Effect: Get in There!.name: Effect: Get in There!
Effect: Get in There!.description: You gain a +5-foot status bonus to Speed. Increase the distance by an additional 5 feet at 7th level, 12th level, and 17th level.

Effect: Got 'Em!.name: Effect: Got 'Em!
Effect: Got 'Em!.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half the origin level, or equal to the origin level if the Strike was a critical hit.

Effect: Harmonic Convergence.name: Effect: Harmonic Convergence
Effect: Harmonic Convergence.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Heroic Last Stand.name: Effect: Heroic Last Stand
Effect: Heroic Last Stand.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.a9ER2amvCuQEJODm]{Heroic Last Stand}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves against fear effects and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Will DC against attempts to Demoralize you.

Effect: Holo-Roger.name: Effect: Holo-Roger
Effect: Holo-Roger.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.8zWFGKRXg1SxIwFH]{Holo-Roger}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Intimidation checks to Coerce.

Effect: Improvised Mastery.name: Effect: Improvised Mastery
Effect: Improvised Mastery.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You are about to attempt a skill check using a skill that you don't have master proficiency in, but you haven't rolled yet.

You trust your instincts to see you through. You gain master proficiency with the triggering skill for the skill check.

Effect: Infernal Armaments.name: Effect: Infernal Armaments
Effect: Infernal Armaments.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.WpJCB3dCycbIzG3w]{Infernal Armaments}

Your gain a status bonus equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice on your first weapon Strike each round. The damage type of this additional damage is determined by your Hellknight's Order.

Effect: Kindle Blaze.name: Effect: Kindle Blaze
Effect: Kindle Blaze.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.dp3jTnxAb98E2BCk]{Kindle Blaze}

You shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light to the next 30 feet. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against attacks, spells, and other effects that have the cold trait.

Effect: Magnetic Field.name: Effect: Magnetic Field
Effect: Magnetic Field.description: Items with the tech trait used within the aura take a –1 circumstance penalty to all checks made using them

Effect: Manifest Energy Wings.name: Effect: Manifest Energy Wings
Effect: Manifest Energy Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.NEYVJWYtgl0rRSwg]{Manifest Energy Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed plus 10 feet.

Effect: Meandering Mind.name: Effect: Meandering Mind
Effect: Meandering Mind.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws. If you roll a success at a saving throw against a mental effect, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Meditative Recovery.name: Effect: Meditative Recovery
Effect: Meditative Recovery.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against mental effects.

Effect: Medpatch.name: Effect: Medpatch
Effect: Medpatch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.equipment.Item.epPPWPTc4W7EfUf2]{Medpatch (Commercial)}, @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.equipment.Item.acDATgrAmxjhfEFB]{Medpatch (Tactical)}, @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.equipment.Item.ROnqVxG1z9wm6CBA]{Medpatch (Advanced)}, @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.equipment.Item.DcTKWLfdYTL43Ks5]{Medpatch (Superior)}, @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.equipment.Item.PkvcfbTHVMLlz2UO]{Medpatch (Elite)}, @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.equipment.Item.KCH0gSUZwQtMLu9G]{Medpatch (Ultimate)}

You gain an item bonus against disease and poisons.

Effect: Mobile Aim.name: Effect: Mobile Aim
Effect: Mobile Aim.description: Commander Eiran's attacks made with the chosen weapon deal an additional 2d6 precision damage and reduce the target's cover bonus to AC by 1.

Effect: Mobile Aim (Ephemeral).name: Effect: Mobile Aim (Ephemeral)
Effect: Mobile Aim (Ephemeral).description: Your cover bonus to AC is reduced by 1.

Effect: Nanite Form.name: Effect: Nanite Form
Effect: Nanite Form.description:
You discorporate into a swarm of nanites for up to 1 minute or until you spend a single action to return to your normal shape. You become Huge, gain the swarm trait, and gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. As a swarm, you have the following characteristics.

  • You're immune to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} conditions.
  • You have weakness 5 to area and splash damage.
  • You can occupy the same space as other creatures and must do so to use your damaging ability.
  • As a @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.PXqI4M6j0WoAL0nJ]{2-action activity}, you can deal @Damage[10d6[acid]] damage to all creatures sharing your space (basic Reflex save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).
  • You can't speak, Cast Spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, Activate magic items, or make any Strikes with your normal body.
  • You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you're still affected normally by mental effects.

Effect: Not in the Face!.name: Effect: Not in the Face!
Effect: Not in the Face!.description: The creature takes a circumstance penalty to attack and damage rolls against you.

Effect: Phase Shift.name: Effect: Phase Shift
Effect: Phase Shift.description: The swarm becomes incorporeal until the start of its next turn. It also gains resistance 10 to all damage (except force, ghost touch, or spirit; double resistance vs non-magical). While incorporeal, the swarm deals an additional 1d10 precision damage to creatures that fail its save against Swarming Bites.

Effect: Rebellious Defiance.name: Effect: Rebellious Defiance
Effect: Rebellious Defiance.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on your attack rolls against the marked creature. You also get this bonus to saving throws against the attacks, spells, and effects of this creature.

Effect: Redirect Energy.name: Effect: Redirect Energy
Effect: Redirect Energy.description: The selected weapon deals an additional 1d4 damage of the triggering damage type. During this time, you lose any resistance to the triggering damage type granted to you by Perfectly Balanced.

Effect: Relentless Endurance.name: Effect: Relentless Endurance
Effect: Relentless Endurance.description: You gain 1d8+4 temporary hit points, plus an additional 1d8+4 for every 4 levels you have beyond 2nd level.

Effect: Restorative Shapeshifting.name: Effect: Restorative Shapeshifting
Effect: Restorative Shapeshifting.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.7yIxWfNZ7yEKs0Fd]{Restorative Shapeshifting}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Search High and Low.name: Effect: Search High and Low
Effect: Search High and Low.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}. Increase the bonus to +3 at 7th level, +4 at 12th level, and +5 at 17th level.

Effect: Shielding Arrogance.name: Effect: Shielding Arrogance
Effect: Shielding Arrogance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.wI0g2nRfu2d0YFAd]{Shielding Arrogance}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Shift Energy.name: Effect: Shift Energy
Effect: Shift Energy.description:
Your next spell deals a different type of damage, determined by rolling a d6, as detailed on the table below. This applies to all damage the spell deals.

D6Damage Type
1acid
2cold
3fire
4electricity
5void
6sonic

Effect: Show 'Em What You Got!.name: Effect: Show 'Em What You Got!
Effect: Show 'Em What You Got!.description: Your allies gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Size Up.name: Effect: Size Up
Effect: Size Up.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Perception checks made against your asset or in relation to your asset if the target knows your asset, and a +1 circumstance bonus to attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about your asset.

Effect: Size of the Ancients.name: Effect: Size of the Ancients
Effect: Size of the Ancients.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.ri5qV0g9RwwWLiBk]{Size of the Ancients}

You grow to size Huge. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you are a shipborn dragonkin), and you gain a +4 status bonus to melee damage.

Effect: Skillful Encouragement.name: Effect: Skillful Encouragement
Effect: Skillful Encouragement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.EFkWRLQwain42TFm]{Skillful Encouragement}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks.

Effect: Solar Shield.name: Effect: Solar Shield
Effect: Solar Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.ZPj5TjISL153EGpW]{Solar Shield}

You can Raise a Shield, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. While the shield is raised, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your shield.

Effect: Soothing Anchor.name: Effect: Soothing Anchor
Effect: Soothing Anchor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Sparkling Performance.name: Effect: Sparkling Performance
Effect: Sparkling Performance.description: You cast dim light in a 20-foot radius. If you are legendary in Performance, you can cast bright light in a 20-foot radius.

Effect: Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit.name: Effect: Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit
Effect: Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.ypSQT2urAcrgaoQ1]{Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Tactical Tutelage.name: Effect: Tactical Tutelage
Effect: Tactical Tutelage.description: Your deal an additional 2d4 precision damage and reduce the target's cover bonus to AC by 1.

Effect: Telekinetic Sprint.name: Effect: Telekinetic Sprint
Effect: Telekinetic Sprint.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.r1bUsyDwcwuN3MUG]{Telekinetic Sprint}

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

Effect: Telekinetic Titan.name: Effect: Telekinetic Titan
Effect: Telekinetic Titan.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.Cj9UI2RZL6WBJ6EB]{Telekinetic Titan}

You can carry Bulk equal to 7 + the chosen attribute modifier before becoming encumbered, and you can hold and carry a total Bulk of 12 + the chosen attribute modifier. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.gNUrQ8jimAvAA0xg]{Telekinetic Lift} action.

Effect: Telepredict.name: Effect: Telepredict
Effect: Telepredict.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.bqQ80aCjgigKSJMY]{Telepredict}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks and Intimidation checks targeting the creature, and to saves against the target's effects that have the fear trait. If you deal mental damage to the target, increase this bonus to +2.

Effect: Unbound Mind.name: Effect: Unbound Mind
Effect: Unbound Mind.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against mental effects.

Effect: Undead Slayer.name: Effect: Undead Slayer
Effect: Undead Slayer.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.kC42tjY689rma6Uc]{Undead Slayer}

You gain access to the critical specialization effects of all weapons and unarmed attacks for attacks you make against the marked creature.

Effect: Unfurl Wings.name: Effect: Unfurl Wings
Effect: Unfurl Wings.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed plus 10 feet.

Effect: Vent Gas.name: Effect: Vent Gas
Effect: Vent Gas.description: You gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to all your Speeds.

Effect: Vitality Network.name: Effect: Vitality Network
Effect: Vitality Network.description:
Tracks your currently available vitality network.

Your vitality network has a maximum capacity equal to @Damage[(6+(4*(@actor.level)))] Hit Points

Effect: Watch Out!.name: Effect: Watch Out!
Effect: Watch Out!.description: You shout a warning to your ally, granting them a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Willful Defiance.name: Effect: Willful Defiance
Effect: Willful Defiance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.feats.Item.NUZClDNinM6oVgJN]{Willful Defiance}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the marked creature's attacks, spells, and other effects.

Effect: You'll Have to Go Through Me!.name: Effect: You'll Have to Go Through Me!

Glitching.name: Glitching
Glitching.description:
Glitching is a condition that affects objects or creatures with the tech trait, and it always includes a value. A glitching creature or object experiences a combination of debilitating effects and moments of seizing up. If you have glitching equipment and take any action involving that equipment, you must attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:10] to see what occurs. If you have the glitching condition on yourself, you must make this flat check at the beginning of every round.

Critical Success Reduce the glitching value by 1.

Success You act as normal or use your equipment as normal.

Failure You take an item penalty on all your checks and DCs equal to your glitching value or the glitching value on the item you're attempting to use.

Critical Failure You count as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} for the round. Alternatively, the object you tried to use doesn't function, and you lose the actions you took to attempt to use it.

Spell Effect: Anthem.name: Spell Effect: Anthem
Spell Effect: Anthem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.BKVIofy6uT5s6S9L]{Anthem}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against effects that cause fascinated or confusion.

Spell Effect: Detect Thoughts.name: Spell Effect: Detect Thoughts
Spell Effect: Detect Thoughts.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.tFsq726ZjUDAzML0]{Detect Thoughts}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Perception to Sense the target's Motives while the spell is sustained. A target who succeeds at its Will save prevents this.

Spell Effect: Elemental Barrier.name: Spell Effect: Elemental Barrier
Spell Effect: Elemental Barrier.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.ufwuEqjIg3yALnLL]{Elemental Barrier}

You gain +1 circumstance bonus to AC. While the spell is in effect, the target can use the Shield Block reaction as if the elemental barrier was a raised shield. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against spells with the chosen elemental trait cast against the creature.

Spell Effect: Genetic Regeneration.name: Spell Effect: Genetic Regeneration
Spell Effect: Genetic Regeneration.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.6koMxltOVtV6BT6U]{Genetic Regeneration}

You gain regeneration equal to twice the spell rank.

Spell Effect: Motivating Ringtone.name: Spell Effect: Motivating Ringtone
Spell Effect: Motivating Ringtone.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.jCr8Airvs1u5D1yR]{Motivating Ringtone}

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to all Speeds and a +1 status bonus to saves against fear effects.

Spell Effect: Reorient.name: Spell Effect: Reorient
Spell Effect: Reorient.description: The target loses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} condition if they have it. The target becomes immune to the off-guard condition until the start of their next turn, even if it would be circumstantially applied, such as being flanked or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings.name: Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings
Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.rgIXThpMnowIYvol]{Skyfire Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet. Your wings are unarmed attacks that deal 1d8 fire damage and has the backswing, reach, and unarmed traits; On a critical hit, a target of your wing attack takes 2 persistent electricity damage.

Heightened (5th) Your wings do 2d8 fire damage and 4 persistent electricity damage on a critical hit. The duration increases to 5 minutes.

Heightened (7th) Your wings do 3d8 fire damage and 6 persistent elecricity damage on a critical hit. The duration increases to 1 hour.

Heightened (9th) Your wings do 4d8 fire damage and 8 persistent electricity damage on a critical hit. The duration increases to 8 hours.

Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (1 Hour).name: Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (1 Hour)
Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (1 Hour).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.rgIXThpMnowIYvol]{Skyfire Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet. Your wings are unarmed attacks that deal 3d8 fire damage and has the backswing, reach, and unarmed traits; On a critical hit, a target of your wing attack takes 6 persistent electricity damage.

Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (5 Minutes).name: Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (5 Minutes)
Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (5 Minutes).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.rgIXThpMnowIYvol]{Skyfire Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet. Your wings are unarmed attacks that deal 2d8 fire damage and has the backswing, reach, and unarmed traits; On a critical hit, a target of your wing attack takes 4 persistent electricity damage.

Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (8 Hours).name: Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (8 Hours)
Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (8 Hours).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.rgIXThpMnowIYvol]{Skyfire Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet. Your wings are unarmed attacks that deal 4d8 fire damage and has the backswing, reach, and unarmed traits; On a critical hit, a target of your wing attack takes 8 persistent electricity damage.

Spell Effect: Song of the Spheres.name: Spell Effect: Song of the Spheres
Spell Effect: Song of the Spheres.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.L5xqxo9onL2zcMCe]{Song of the Spheres}

Critical Success As success, except the effect lasts 3 rounds.

Success You and all bonded allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls for 1 round.

Failure As success, except this only affects you and one selected bonded ally within range.

Critical Failure The spell has no effect.

Spell Effect: Wild Bond.name: Spell Effect: Wild Bond
Spell Effect: Wild Bond.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.3r9Xrt8qqTQbcw26]{Wild Bond}

Tapping into the universal life code, you infuse the target with the primal essence of another living creature and grant them one of the following abilities.

  • A burrow Speed of 15 feet
  • A climb Speed of 20 feet
  • A fly Speed of 20 feet
  • A swim Speed of 25 feet
  • A Speed of 40 feet
  • A jaw unarmed attack that deals @Damage[1d8[piercing]] damage
  • A claw unarmed attack that deals @Damage[1d6[slashing]] damage and has the agile and finesse traits
  • Darkvision

Heightened (3rd) The damage dealt by the attacks increases to two dice.

Heightened (6th) The damage dealt by the attacks increases to three dice.

Heightened (9th) The damage dealt by the attacks increases to four dice.

Suppressed.name: Suppressed
Suppressed.description: You have been affected by a high volume of incoming fire or a particularly dangerous attack that forces you to act less efficiently for your own safety. You take a –1 circumstance penalty on attack rolls and a –10-foot status penalty to your Speed.

Untethered.name: Untethered
Untethered.description: You're in a zero gravity (or similar) environment without a means of movement and float without support. You can't take move actions unless they specify they can be used in your current environment. At the end of your turn, you move 5 feet in the last direction you moved. You can take the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.FF5KgZHj345s2moq]{Push Off} action to change directions and the distance moved. Once you gain a means of moving in your environment, you lose this condition. Typically, a creature with the untethered condition in zero-g also gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} conditions while untethered.
